response.overview: Militarie Gun “Live Under The Sun” Mini Documentary featuring Manchester Orchestra, Mannequin Pussy & Pool Kids  Manchester Orchestra invited us to their home studio to perform the “Life Under The Sun” songs together and we brought along our friends and documenting the rehearsals and performances resulting in a doc about creation and collaboration.  Featuring...  Ian Shelton, Waylon Trim and Will Acuña from Militarie Gun Robert McDowell and Andy Hull  from Manchester Orchestra Marisa Dabice from Mannequin Pussy Christine Goodwyne from Pool Kids  Crew: Directed by Isaac Deitz Edited by Shawn Skadberg Cameras by Isaac Deitz and James Wightman Production assistant and VHS camera by Audrey Deitz Recorded and mixed by TJ Elias Additional engineering by Jamie Martens  Additional engineering and production by Robert McDowell Re-recording mix by Beau Manning
response.title: Live Under The Sun
